name: team_profile_change
desc: Team profile fields have been updated.
long_desc: My Slack API Getting started Slack apps Messages Integrations APIs Authentication Keep in touch Helpful resources Compatibility: RTM   The team_profile_change event is sent to all connections for a team when a Team Admin updates the field definitions in the team profile. Only the modified field definitions are included in the payload. Where appropriate, clients should update to reflect new changes immediately.
